attributes.action: Put pressure on UN to hold accountable the Sri Lankan government for the recent war crimes
attributes.additional_details: After the brutal and shocking war in Sri Lanka that raged at the end of the last decade I feel that there is sufficient evidence of war crimes and crimes against humanity. The leaders of the governments army divisions and the president himself should be tried, the president's brother and whoever else from the "top brass" is alleged to have been involved in the slaughter of innocents should also face justice. May the 10's of thousands of innocent people who were murdered rest in peace. Thank you, and spread the word.
